title: Mutually Exclusive Events
text: The events “drawing a heart” and “drawing a spade” are mutually exclusive because they cannot occur at the same time.

title: Drawing a Heart
text: The probability of drawing a heart is $$\frac{1}{4}$$

title: Drawing a Spade
text: the probability of drawing a spade is also $$\frac{1}{4}$$

title: Addition
text: Add the probability of drawing a heart with the probability of drawing a spade.
